desc: Sustainable, eco friendly activewear. Bamboo leggings and tops. Slimming, comfortable leggings, high waisted, with pockets. A range of ethical fabrics including bamboo, organic cotton, and modal. Natural, chemical free plant dyeing. So no to fast fashion and buy BondieEco. Designed in Bondi to be styling anywhere.

layout.text:
Sustainable, ethical clothing and activewear.
Bamboo, organic cotton, natural dyes.
